subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dwayne Roloson was signed by the Islanders as insurance until Rick DiPietro returned from injury, but now Roloson has a 12-7-5 record.
snippet: Dwayne Roloson was signed by the Islanders as insurance until Rick DiPietro returned from injury, but now Roloson has a 12-7-5 record.
